casebody.data:
Ronald F. BOZELKO
v.
Jennifer VENDITTO, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 22, 2017 Ronald F. Bozelko, self-represented, and Katherine A. Bozelko, self-represented, in support of the petition. Gerald L. Garlick, in opposition.

The petition by Ronald F. Bozelko and Katherine A. Bozelko for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39689) is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
